name: Through Green Doors
description:
It's been a long time since the beginning of your adventure. You've been through injuries, death, probably actual dismemberment in some cases... but who knew that that would only be the first chapter of an adventure that would last a lot longer? After all, Scratch's manor truly isn't the place for an intrepid adventurer and friendship connoisseur such as yourself, is it?

Through Green Doors is a completely non-canonical friendsim fangame that is styled after the official game, and picks up where it left off. Created by a small community of Homestuck/Hiveswap fans, Through Green Doors drags our beloved yet ever-suffering MC back through the world of Alternia to meet some more trolls with the goal of maybe making some more friends whilst not dying, hopefully.
